mapper.insert: insert into board( subject, content, writer, password )values( #{subject}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{password} )
update board set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, password = #{password} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, subject, content, writer, date_format(register_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') register_datetime from board order by id limit #{start}, #{end}
select id, subject, content, writer, date_format(register_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') register_datetime from board where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board_reply( board_id, parent_id, depth, reply_content, reply_writer, reply_password )values( #{board_id}, #{parent_id}, #{depth}, #{reply_content}, #{reply_writer}, #{reply_password} )
mapper.select: select reply_id, board_id, parent_id, depth, reply_content, reply_writer, reply_password from board_reply where board_id = #{id} order by reply_id asc
mapper.delete: delete from board_reply where reply_id in ( select reply_id from (select reply_id from board_reply where reply_id = #{reply_id} and reply_password = #{reply_password}) a ) or parent_id in ( select reply_id from (select reply_id from board_reply where reply_id = #{reply_id} and reply_password = #{reply_password}) a )
mapper.select: select count(id) from board where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
select count(*) from board_reply where reply_id = #{reply_id} and reply_password = #{reply_password}
mapper.update: update board_reply set parent_id = #{parent_id}, depth = #{depth}, reply_content = #{reply_content}, reply_writer = #{reply_writer}, reply_password = #{reply_password} where reply_id = #{reply_id}
